RelatedSentence: DENPASAR ( AFP ) - An 84 - year - old man could face death by firing squad for smuggling crystal methamphetamine worth more than 5 billion rupiah ( S $ 550,000 ) into the Indonesian resort island of Bali , an official said Monday .
Arsain bin Anwar , an Indonesian national who lives in Malaysia , was arrested on Friday with 2.5 kg of the drug in his luggage , airport customs chief I Made Wijaya said .
Arsain bin Anwar , an Indonesian national who lives in Malaysia , was arrested on Friday with 2.5 kg of the drug in his luggage , airport customs chief I Made Wijaya said .
Under Indonesia 's tough anti-drugs laws , he could face the death penalty if convicted of smuggling that quantity of drugs , he said .
